definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi
gun/firearm/rifle/spear/thing with shape or function similar to a gun/CL:支[zhi1],把[ba3],桿|杆[gan3],條|条[tiao2],枝[zhi1]/to substitute for another person in a test/to knock/classifier for rifle shots

sentences.english: What Is the Most Powerful Airsoft Gun?
After the costly German airguns purchase, I learned my lesson so I started buying cheaper, American made ones.
sentences.chinese: 買昂貴的德國造氣槍給我上了一課，我開始買便宜的。

sentences.english: The hunter is using his newly-bought pneumatic gun to shoot the birds.
sentences.chinese: 這個獵人正用他新買的氣槍來打鳥。

sentences.english: These figures do not include low-powered air rifles or air pistols。
sentences.chinese: 這一數字還不包括低火力的氣槍和氣壓噴槍擁有者。

sentences.english: I would prefer the sites be related to airsoft.
sentences.chinese: 我希望有關的網站被氣槍。

sentences.english: Uncle Jim took the air rifle and went on a recce to the far end of the quarry.
sentences.chinese: 吉姆叔叔拿起氣槍一路巡查到採石場的最遠處。

sentences.english: What Are the Dangers of Airsoft Guns?
Methods Self-made plastic gun was used to produce the eyeball rupture model.
sentences.chinese: 方法自制氣槍製做前段眼球破裂傷模型。

sentences.english: The Super 9 is the ideal choice for Airsoft players who are new to the marksman role.
sentences.chinese: 超級9氣槍球員，誰是新的射手角色的理想選擇。

sentences.english: High-pressure air is needed for airgun source operation.
sentences.chinese: 氣槍震源作業需要高壓空氣。

sentences.english: Five days later, she took silver in women's three-position rifle.
sentences.chinese: 五天後，她奪取了女子氣槍三姿賽的銀牌。

sentences.english: A husband who used his semi-naked wife for target practice with an air rifle has been jailed.
sentences.chinese: 利用半裸妻子來做空氣槍打靶練習的丈夫已被囚禁。

sentences.english: Making an Airsoft gun more accurate requires upgrading the inner barrel to the appropriate size for the ammunition.
sentences.chinese: 作出更準確的要求氣槍內桶提升到適當大小的彈藥。

definition: a gun/guns in general/same as 槍支|枪支
to attack with a bladed weapon
